com.twitter.common.net.http.handlers
Class QuitHandler

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          com.twitter.common.net.http.handlers.QuitHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class QuitHandler
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

A servlet that provides a way to remotely signal the process to initiate a clean shutdown sequence.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

QUIT_HANDLER_KEY

public static final java.lang.String QUIT_HANDLER_KEY
A @Named binding key for the QuitHandler listener.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

QuitHandler

@Inject
public QuitHandler(java.lang.Runnable quitListener)
Constructs a new QuitHandler that will notify the given quitListener when the servlet is accessed. It is the responsibility of the listener to initiate a clean shutdown of the process.

Parameters:
quitListener - Runnable to notify when the servlet is accessed.
